fileDesc.titleStmt: Aquane an ignis sit utilior Machine readable text Plutarch Gregorius N. Bernardakis&responsibility;&fund.NEH;

div2.p:
*)ariston me
 u)/dwr o( de\ xruse\is ai)qo/menon
pu=r
fhsin o( *pi/ndaros: w(/sq' ou(=tos me
 deute/ran a)/ntikrus tw=| puri\ xw/ran e)/dwke:' sumfwnei= de\ kai\ *(hsi/odos ei)pw

h)/toi me
 prw/tista xa/os ge/neto:'
toi=s plei/stois ga w)nomake/nai dokei= to\ u(/dwr tou=ton to
 tro/pon para\ th
 xu/sin. a)lla\ to\ me
 tw=n martu/rwn e(kate/rois i)/son: e)pei\ kai\ to\ pu=r ei)sin oi( tou= panto\s a)rxh
 a)pofaino/menoi, kai\ oi(=on spe/rma tou=t' e)c e(autou= te pa/nta poiei=n kai\ ei)s e(auto\
e)klamba/nein kata\ th
 e)kpu/rwsin. a)fe/menoi de\ tw=n a)ndrw=n, skeyw/meqa tou\s ei)s e(ka/teron lo/gous ph=| ma=llon a)/gousin h(ma=s.

i*)(\ar' ou)=n ou) xrhsimw/teron e)kei=no, ou(= pa
tote kai\ dihnekw=s deo/meqa kai\ plei/stou, kaqa/per
e)rgalei=on kai\ o)/rganon, kai\ nh\ *di/a fi/los o( pa/shs w(/ras kai\ panto\s kairou= parw
 e(/toimos; kai\ mh
 to\ me
 pu=r ou) pa/ntote xrh/simon, e)/sti d' o(/te kai\ baruno/meqa kai\ a)pospw/meqa: tou= d' u(/datos xrei/a kai\ xeimw=nos kai\ qe/rous kai\ nosou=si kai\ u(giai/nousi, nukto\s kai\ meq' h(me/ran kai\ ou)k e)/stin o(/te a)/nqrwpos ou) dei=tai: a)me/lei tou\s a)poqano/ntas “a)li/bantas” kalou=sin w(s e)ndeei=s liba/dos toute/stin u(gro/thtos, kai\ para\ tou=to tou\s steroume/nous tou= zh=n. kai\ a)/neu me
 puro\s h)=n polla/, u(/datos d' ou)de/pot' a)/nqrwpos. e)/ti de\ to\ e)c a)rxh=s kai\ a(/ma th=| prw/th| katabolh=| tw=n a)nqrw/pwn xrhsimw/teron tou= u(/steron eu(reqe/ntos: dh=lon ga w(s to\ me
 o(/ntws a)nagkai=on h( fu/sis e)/dwke: to\ de\ periousi/a| th=s xrh/sews te/xnh kai\ mhxanh/ tis eu(=ren. u(/dwr me
 ou)=n ou)k e)/stin ei)pei=n o(/t' ou)k h)=n a)nqrw/pois ou)de/ tis eu(reth\s le/getai qew=n h)\ h(rw/wn sxedo
 ga genome/nwn eu)qu\s u(ph=rxe kai\ to\ gegenh=sqai parei=xen. h( de\ puro\s xrh=sis e)xqe/s fasi kai\ prw/|hn u(po\ *promhqe/ws : :' bi/os puro/s, ou)k a)/neu d' u(/datos h)=n. kai\ to\ me
 pla/sma tou=to mh\ ei)=nai poihtiko
 a)podei/knusin o( kaq' h(ma=s bi/os: e)/sti ga a)nqrw/pwn ge/nh tina\ xwri\s puro\s poiou/mena th
 di/aitan, a)/oika kai\ a)ne/stia kai\
u(pai/qria: kai\ *dioge/nhs d' o( ku/wn h(\kista prosexrh=to puri/, w(/ste kai\ polu/poda katapiw
 w)mo/n “ou(/tws u(pe u(mw=n” ei)=pen “w)= a)/ndres, paraba/llomai.” xwri\s d' u(/datos ou)/te kalo/n tis e)no/mise zh=n ou)/te dunato/n.

kai\ ti/ mikrologou=mai th\n tw=n a)nqrw/pwn e)perxo/menos fu/sin; pollw=n ga\r o)/ntwn, ma=llon d' a)pei/rwn genw=n, to\ tw=n a)nqrw/pwn sxedo\n mo/non oi)=de puro\s xrh=sin, ta\ de\ loipa\ a)pu/rois xrh=tai diai/tais kai\ trofai=s, kai\ bi/os au)toi=s: nemome/nois, i(ptame/nois, e(/rpousin, a)po\ r(izw=n kai\ karpw=n kai\ sarkw=n a)/neu puro/s: u(/datos de\ xwri\s ou)k e)/nalon ou)de\ xersai=on ou)k ai)qe/rion kai\ ga\r ta\ sarko bo/ra tw=n zw/|wn, w(=n e)/nia/ fhsi mh\ pi/nein *)aristote/lhs
, tw=| g' e)nto\s u(grw=| xrw/mena diazh=|. tou=t' ou)=n xrhsimw/teron, ou(= mhdemi/a zwh=s fu/sis a)/neu i(/statai kai\ diame/nei.

kai\ mh
 kai\ xrhsimw/teron o(\ mhde/pote bla/ptei. pu=r me
 ou)=n r(e/on o)leqriw/taton, h( d' u(/datos fu/sis ou)de/pote blabera/. kai\ mh
 duei=n w)felimw/teron to\ eu)tele/steron kai\ xwri/s tinos paraskeuh=s th
 e)c au(tou= pare/xon w)fe/leian h( me
 ou)=n a)po\ tou= puro\s xorhgi/as dei=tai kai\ u(/lhs: dia\ tou=to mete/xousin au)tou= ple/on plou/sioi penh/twn, basilei=s i)diwtw=n to\ d' u(/dwr kai\ tou=t' e)/xei fila/nqrwpon, th
 i)so/thta, to\ o(/moion: ou) dei=tai ga o)rga/nwn ou)d' e)rgalei/wn, a)prosdee/s, au)totele\s a)gaqo/n.

e)/ti mh/n, o(\ pollaplasiazo/menon th
 w)fe/leian a)po/llusin, a)xrhsto/teron toiou=ton de\ to\ pu=r, oi(=on qhri/on pamfa/gon kai\ da/panon tw=n parakeime/nwn, kai\ meqo/dw| kai\ te/xnh| ma=llon kai\ metrio/thti h)\ th=| au(tou= fu/sei w)fe/limon: to\ d' u(/dwr ou)de/pote fobero/n. kai\ mh
 duei=n to\ meta\ tou= e(te/rou xrhsimw/teron pu=r me
 ou)=n ou)k e)pide/xetai to\ u(gro
 ou)de\
th=| di' au)tou= koinwni/a| xrh/simon, u(/dwr d' e)sti\ meta\ puro\s; w)fe/limon ta\ gou=n qerma\ tw=n u(da/twn a)ke/sima kai\ pro\s qerapei/an eu)ai/sqhta. kai\ pu=r me
 u(gro
 ou)k a)/n tis eu(/roi, u(/dwr, d' w(s yuxro
 ou(/tw kai\ qermo
 w)fe/limon a)nqrw/pw|.

kai\ mh/n, tetta/rwn o)/ntwn tw=n stoixei/wn, to\ u(/dwr e)c e(autou= pe/mpton, w(s a)/n tis ei)/poi, pepoi/hke stoixei=on th
 qa/lassan, ou)de
 h(=tton e)kei/nwn w)fe/limon tw=n t' a)/llwn e(/neken kai\ ma/lista th=s e)pimici/as: a)/grion ou)=n h(mw=n o)/nta kai\ a)su/mbolon to
 bi/on tou=to to\ stoixei=on sunh=ye kai\ te/leion e)poi/hse, diorqou/menon tai=s par' a)llh/lwn e)pikouri/ais kai\ a)ntido/sesi, koinwni/an d' e)rgazo/menon kai\ fili/an. *(hra/kleitos me
 ou)=n “ei) mh\ h(/lios” fhsi
 “h)=n, eu)fro/nh
a)
 h)=n” e)/sti d' ei)pei=n, w(s, ei) mh\ qa/latta h)=n, pa/ntwn a)
 a)griw/taton zw=|on ka)ndee/staton o( a)/nqrwpos h)=n. nuni\ de\ tou=to me
 par' *)indw=n a)/mpelon
toi=s *(/ellhsin, e)k de\ th=s *(ella/dos karpw=n xrh=sin toi=s e)pe/keina th=s qala/sshs e)/dwken, e)k *foini/khs
de\ gra/mmata mnhmo/suna lh/qhs e)ko/misen, a)/oinon de\ kai\ a)/karpon kai\ a)pai/deuton e)kw/lusen ei)=nai to\ plei=ston a)nqrw/pwn ge/nos. pw=s ou)=n ou) xrhsimw/teron u(/dwr stoixei/w| peritteu=on;

h)\ pro\s tou)nanti/on a)/n tis e)nteu=qen e)/xwn le/goi; dio/ti te/ttara me
 stoixei=a qew=| kaqa/per texni/th| pro\s th
 tw=n o(/lwn e)rgasi/an u(pokei/mena, tou/twn d) au)= pa/lin a)llh/lois diafora/, plh
 gh= me
 kai\ u(/dwr u(pobe/blhtai di/khn u(/lhs poiou/mena kai\
platto/mena kai\ mete/xonta ko/smou kai\ ta/cews kai\ tou= fu/ein ge, fasi/, kai\ genna=n, o(/son a)
 metala/bh| par' e(te/rwn, pneu=ma/ me
 kai\ pu=r poiou/ntwn kai\ dhmiourgou/ntwn kai\ kei/mena nekra\ te/ws e)pi\ th
 ge/nesin a)nista/ntwn tw=n de\ duei=n tou/twn au)=qis to\ pu=r a)/rxei kai\ h(gemoneu/ei. dh=lon d' e)k th=s e)pagwgh=s: gh= te ga a)/neu qermh=s ou)si/as a)/gonos kai\ a)/karpos: to\ de\ pu=r e)krao\s kai\ diaxe/an pari/sthsin ei)s th
 ge/nesin o)rgw=nta ou)demi/an ga ai)ti/an eu(/roi tis a)/n, di' h(
 a)/gonoi pe/trai kai\ ta\ katesklhko/ta tw=n o)rw=n pa=sin h)\ o(/ti puro\s ou)d' o(/lws h)\ o)li/gon mete/sxhke.

to\ d' o(/lon tosou=ton a)pe/xei pro\s swthri/an h)\ e(te/rwn ge/nesin to\ u)/dwr au)totele\s ei)=nai, w(/ste kai\ au)tw=| fqora\ puro\s e)/ndeia: sune/xei ga h( qermo/ths e(/kaston e)n tw=| ei)=nai kai\ e)pi\ th=s i)di/as ou)si/as fula/ttei kaqa/per kai\ ta)/lla kai\ to\ u(/dwr: a)pe/xontos de\ kai\ e)ndeh/santos, sh/petai kai\ qa/natos u(/dati kai\ o)/leqros e)pi/leiyis qermo/thtos. a)me/lei ta\ limnai=a kai\ o(/sa sta/sima tw=n u(da/twn kai/ tina e)n a)dieco/dois e)gkaqh/mena koilo/thsi moxqhra/, kai\ teleutw=nta sh/petai tw=| kinh/sews h(/kista mete/xein, h(\ to\ qermo
 e)n e(ka/stois r(ipi/zousa threi= peri\ ta\
ma/lista fero/mena kai\ r(e/onta tw=n u(da/twn, dia\ th
 ki/nhsin sunexome/nhs th=s qermo/thtos, ou(/tw kai\ prosagoreu/omen, zh=n le/gontes. pw=s toi/nun duei=n ou)k w)felimw/teron, o(\ tw=| e(te/rw| th
 ai)ti/an tou= ei)=nai pare/sxhke, kaqa/per to\ pu=r tw=| u(/dati; kai\ mh/n, ou(= panta/pasin a)pallage/ntos fqei/retai to\ zw=|on , tou=t' w)felimw/teron dh=lon ga w(s to\ ou(= sterou/menon ou)k e)/stin ei)=nai, tou=to kai\ th
 ai)ti/an pare/sxhken, o(/t' h)=n. u(gro/ths me
 ou)=n kai\ toi=s teqnhko/si pa/resti
kai\ ou)k e)ch/|rhtai panta/pasin e)pei\ ou)k a)
 e)sh/peto ta\ nekra\ tw=n swma/twn, th=s sh/yews ei)s u(gro
 ou)/shs e)k chrou= metabolh=s, ma=llon d' u(grw=n e)n sarki\ fqora=s. qa/natos d' ou)k a)/llo ti plh
 e)/kleiyis qermou= pantelh/s: yuxro/tatoi toi/nun oi( nekroi/: kai\ ta\s a)kma/s, ei)/ tis e)pixeiroi/h, tw=n curw=n a)pamblu/nousi di' u(perbolh
 yuxro/thtos. kai\ e)n au)tw=| de\ tw=| zw/|w| ta\ h(/kista mete/xonta puro\s a)naisqhto/tata, kaqa/per o)sta= kai\ tri/xes kai\ ta\ po/rrwqen a)festw=ta th=s kardi/as sxedo
 ga h( pro\s
ta\ e)k th=s a)pousi/as mei/zwn tw=n e)k th=s tou= puro\s gi/gnetai parousi/as diafora/. futa\ me
 ga kai\ karpou\s ou)x h( u(gro/ths a)nadi/dwsin a)ll' h( qermh\ u(gro/ths: a)me/lei ta\ yuxra\ tw=n u(da/twn h(=tton h)\ ou)d' o(/lws go/nima. kai/toi g' ei) th=| au(tou= fu/sei to\
u(/dwr karpofo/ron, dei= pa/ntote kai\ kaq' au(to\
a)nafe/rein karpou/s: to\ de\ tou)nanti/on kai\ blabero/n e)stin.

a)p' a)/llhs a)rxh=s. pro\s me
 th
 puro\s w(s puro\s xrh=sin u(/datos ou) prosdeo/meqa, a)lla\ tou)nanti/on e)mpodw
 gi/gnetai katasbe/nnusi ga kai\ diafqei/rei. u(/datos de\ toi=s plei/stois xrh=sis ou)k e)/stin a)/neu puro/s: qermanqe
 ga w(felimw/teron, ou(/tw de\ blabero/n. w(/ste duei=n a)/meinon o(\ a)f' e(autou= pare/xetai xrei/an, tou= e(te/rou mh\ prosdeo/menon. e)/ti u(/dwr me
 monaxw=s w)fe/limon kata\ qi/cin lousame/nois h)\ niyame/nois, to\ de\ pu=r dia\ pa/shs ai)sqh/sews: kai\ ga dia\ th=s a(fh=s kai\ po/rrwqen o(rw/menon, w(/ste prosei=nai toi=s a)/llois th=s xrei/as au)tou= kai\ th
 polute/leian.

to\ ga le/gein w(s e)/sti pote\ o( a)/nqrwpos a)/neu puro\s ou)d' o(/lws du/natai gene/sqai o( a)/nqrwpos. diaforai\ d' ei)si
 e)n ge/nei kaqa/per kai\ e)n a)/llois. kai\ th
 qa/lattan h( qermo/ths w)felimwte/ran e)poi/hsen, w(s ma=llon kataqerh= tw=n u(da/twn, e)pei\ kat' au(to/ ge tw=n loipw=n ou)de
 die/fere. kai\ oi( mh\ prosdeo/menoi de\ tou= e)/cwqen puro\s ou)x w(s a)prosdeei=s tou=to pa/sxousin, a)lla\ periousi/a| kai\ pleonasmw=| tou= e)n au(toi=s qermou=: w(/ste kai\ kata\
tou=q' u(pere/xein th
 tou= puro\s xrei/an, w(s ei)ko/s. to\ me
 u(/dwr ou)de/pote toiou=ton, w(/ste mh\ dei=sqai tw=n e)kto/s, to\ de\ pu=r u(p' a)reth=s pollh=s kai\ au)/tarkes, w(s ou)=n strathgo\s a)mei/nwn o( paraskeua/sas th
 po/lin mh\ dei=sqai tw=n e)/cwqen summa/xwn, ou(/tw kai\ stoixei=on to\ th=s e)/cwqen e)pikouri/as pare/xon polla/kis mh\ deo/menon u(pere/xon. tou=to r(hte/on kai\ peri\ tw=n a)/llwn zw/|wn, o(/sa mh\ puro\s dei=tai. kai/toi g' ei)s tou)nanti/on la/boi tis a)/n, to\ xrhsimw/teron ei)=nai tou=to, w(=| xrw/meqa mo/noi oi( kai\ ma/lista to\ be/ltion e)k logismou= labei=n duna/menoi: e)pei\ ti/ lo/gou xrhsimw/teron h)\ ma=llon a)nqrw/pois lusitele/steron; a)ll' ou) pa/resti toi=s a)lo/gois. ti/ ou)=n; dia\ tou=q' h(=tton w)fe/limon e)k th=s pronoi/as tou= belti/onos eu(reqe/n;

e)pei\ de\ kata\ tou=to tou= lo/gou gego/namen, ti/ te/xnhs tw=| bi/w| lusitele/steron; te/xnhs de\ pa/sas kai\ a)neu=re to\ pu=r kai\ sw/|zei dio\ kai\ to
 *(/hfaiston a)rxhgo
 au)tw=n poiou=si. kai\ mh
 o)li/gou xro/nou kai\ bi/ou toi=s a)nqrw/pois dedome/nou, o( me
 *)ari/stwn fhsi
 o(/ti o( u(/pnos oi(=on telw/nhs to\ h(\misu a)fairei= tou/tou: e)gw\ d' a)
 ei)/poimi dio/per sko/tos e)grh/goren a)ei\ dia\ nukto/s, a)ll' ou)de
 o)/felos a)po\ th=s e)grhgo/rsews, ei) mh\ to\ pu=r ta\ th=s h(me/ras h(mi=n parei=xen
a)gaqa/, kai\ th
 h(me/ras kai\ nukto\s e)ch/|rei diafora/n. ei) toi/nun tou= zh=n ou)de
 a)nqrw/pois lusitele/steron
kai\ tou=to pollaplasia/zei to\ pu=r, pw=s ou)k kai\ ei)/h pa/ntwn w)felimw/taton;

kai\ mh/n, ou(= plei/stou kra=sis th=s tw=n ai)sqh/sewn metei/lhfen, ou)k a)
 ei)/h lusitele/staton; ou)x
o(ra=|s ou)=n, w(s th=| me
 u(gra=| fu/sei ou)demi/a tw=n ai)sqh/sewn kat' au(th
 prosxrh=tai xwri\s pneu/matos h)\ puro\s e)gkekrame/nou, tou= de\ puro\s a(/pasa me
 ai)/sqhsis, oi(=on to\ zwtiko
 e)nergazome/nou, metei/lhfen, e)caire/tws d' h( o)/yis, h(	is o)cuta/th tw=n dia\
sw/mato/s e)stin ai)sqh/sewn, puro\s e)/camma ou)=sa kai\ o(/ti qew=n pi/stin pare/sxhken e)/ti te, *pla/twn fhsi/, duna/meqa katasxhmati/zein pro\s ta\s tw=n e)n ou)ranw=| kinh/seis th
 yuxh
 dia\ th=s o)/yews;
